title: Central city shooting at midday investigated
content:
A person was shot Thursday in central Toledo about the same time a car also was shot at, according to information from police and witnesses.
Shortly after 2 p.m., a man went in the G&M Food Mart at 526 N. Detroit Ave. near Nebraska Avenue and said he had been shot, said Lewis Babona, owner of the carryout. The man was shot in both feet on Tecumseh Street near North Detroit a short time before, according to police radio traffic.
Mr. Babona said the victim was bleeding all over the floor. He was asked to leave.
Police believe the man was shot during a robbery attempt, said Lt. Joe Heffernan, police spokesman.
Police radio traffic also indicated a person went to the Scott Park police station about that time saying his car had just been shot at.
